other_tests.findings: Thyroid scintigraphy showed no radioiodide uptake (RIUT 0%)
NIS sequencing identified the new homozygous mutation, R124H, in exon 2.
Documented correct targeting of the mutated protein to the plasma membrane of transfected cells.
Genotype-phenotype correlation analysis showed various age at onset of hypothyroidism correlating with specific mutations.
